title: Multiepitope fusion protein-based ELISA for enhanced brucellosis serodiagnosis
description: Author summary This study developed a multiepitope fusion protein for improved diagnosis of human brucellosis. Linear B-cell epitopes for Brucella proteins were identified from the Immune Epitope Database (IEDB) and constructed a fusion protein comprising 11 …
